short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Jobstream is an extension to help you apply to jobs faster, with better applications.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
JobStream enhances your job application process by auto-generating a tailored cover letterincorporating your unique experiences, all aligned to the job position you're seeking, alongside automatically answering questions in applications.

All you need to do is upload your resume, details of your experiences and start choosing the job descriptions. JobStream will automatically generate personalized cover letters, providing you with a quick and optimised starting point for your application process.
